message: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

message: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

message: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

message: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
author: Nelson Mandela
